revisions.rev:
'''Wrangel''' (sometimes [[transliterated]] as '''Wrangell''') is a [[Baltic German]] noble family, included in [[List of Swedish noble families|Swedish]], [[Russian nobility|Russian]] and [[Prussia]]n nobility.
== Notable members == [[File:Wrangel COA.jpg|thumb|175px|Wrangel Family Arms]] * [[Herman Wrangel]] (ca.1584-1643), a Swedish Governor-General of [[Livonia]], Field Marshal, and Privy Councillor * [[Carl Gustaf Wrangel]] (1613â1676), a [[Sweden|Swedish]] soldier and Privy Councillor (son of Herman Wrangel) * [[Heinrich Johann Freiherr Wrangell]] from Addinal (''[[Andrei Ivanovich Wrangel]]'', 1736â1813), Russian General-Lieutenant * [[Ferdinand von Wrangel]] (''Ferdinand Petrovich Wrangel'', 1797â1870), [[Imperial Russian Navy]] admiral, [[Arctic]] explorer, Governor of [[Russian Alaska]] * [[Ferdinand Georg Friedrich von Wrangel]] (''[[Ferdinand Ferdinandovich Wrangel]]'', 1844â1919) * [[Pyotr Nikolayevich Wrangel]] (Peter von Wrangel, 1878â1928), a leader of the [[White Army]] during the [[Russian Civil War]] * [[Alexander Evstafiyevich Wrangel]] (1804â1880), Baron, Russian infantry general * [[Wilhelm Bernhard Friedrich von Wrangel]] (''[[Vasili Vasiliyevich Wrangel]]'', 1797â1872), Baron, Imperial Russian Navy admiral * [[Vasili Georgiyevich Wrangel]] (1816â1860) * [[Georg Gustav Ludwig von Wrangel]] (''[[Yegor Vasiliyevich Wrangel]]'', 1784â1841) * [[Karl Michael von Wrangel]] (''[[Karl Yegorovich Wrangel]]'', 1794â1874), Baron Russian cavalry general * [[Reinhold Otto Fabian von Wrangel]] (''[[Roman Yegorovich Wrangel]]'', 1797â1884), Russian General of [[Artillery]] * [[Karl Karlovich Wrangel]] (1800â1872), Baron, Russian infantry general * [[Hans Georg Hermann von Wrangel]] (''[[Yegor Ermolayevich Wrangel]]'', 1803â1868) * Karl Gustav von Wrangel (''[[Karl Reingoldovich Wrangel]]'', 1742â1824), Russian infantry general. * [[Georg von Wrangel]] (''[[Yegor Yegorovich Wrangel]]'', 1827â1875), Russian senator * [[Michael von Wrangel]] (''[[Mihhail Yegorovich Wrangel]]'', 1803â1868), Russian General-Lieutenant, Governor of Livland * [[Vasili Georgiyevich Wrangel]] (1862â1901) * [[Margarete von Wrangell|Margarethe Mathilde von Wrangell]] (1877â1932), the first female full professor at a German university ([[University of Hohenheim]], Stuttgart) * [[Nikolai Nikolayevich Wrangel]] (1880â1915) * [[Hans Olaf von Wrangel]] (1928â2009), Baron, German parliamentarian

==See also== * [[Friedrich Graf von Wrangel|Friedrich Heinrich Ernst Graf von Wrangel]] (1784â1877), [[Prussia]]n ''[[Generalfeldmarschall]]''
